title: Texas man arrested for 'raping dancer at a strip club after asking for a private dance'
text:
A man from Texas has been arrested after he allegedly repeatedly raped a dancer at a strip club.

Zachary Lee Johnson, 28, was tracked down by police after another dancer from the Cloud 9 strip club in Abilene gave them his phone number.

The victim said that at 1.40am Johnson asked her for a private dance and once they were in another room he pushed her against a wall and raped her several times, according to Abilene Reporter News.

Zachary Lee Johnson, 28, was arrested after he allegedly repeatedly raped a dancer at Cloud 9 strip club in Abilene, Texas

The victim said that at 1.40am Johnson asked her for a private dance and once they were in another room he pushed her against a wall and raped her several times. Pictured is the Cloud 9 strip club

She eventually managed to fight her attacker off and escape the room before calling police.

Johnson answered his phone when police called him and he was found at a nearby store.

He was arrested on Wednesday and charged with one count of sexual assault but was released from the Taylor County jail after paying his $30,000 bail later that day.

He doesn't have any previous criminal records according to the Dallas Morning News.

Police are still investigating.
description: Zachary Lee Johnson, 28, was arrested on Wednesday after he allegedly repeatedly raped a dancer at Cloud 9 strip club in Abilene, Texas. He has now been released on $30,000 bail.
